entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Alliston
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
